alert.note: Alert for Walworth (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 4:02PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Walworth County through 430 PM CDT... At 402 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Darien, or near Delavan, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elkhorn, Delavan, East Troy, Williams Bay, Walworth, Fontana-On-Geneva Lake, Sharon, Darien, Como, Potter Lake, Springfield, La Grange, Honey Creek, Abells Corners, Tibbets, Allens Grove, Millard, Troy Center, and Delavan Lake. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 12 between mile markers 320 and 327. Interstate 43 between mile markers 12 and 42. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central and southeastern Wisconsin.
